巤字的基本解释

liè
毛发。

巤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liè］
［《廣韻》良涉切，入葉，來。］
(1)兽类颈上较粗硬的毛。
(2)引申指针状叶。

巤字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【巛字部】　巤； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页324第22
【唐韻】良涉切【集韻】力涉切，?音獵。【說文】毛巤也。象髮在卤上，及毛髮巤巤之形。【廣韻】本也。又鼠毛也。　【玉篇】亦作鬣。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liè］
["Guangyun" Liangshe cuts, enters the leaves, come. ]
(1) The coarser hair on the neck of a beast.
(2) Extended pointer-shaped leaves.

[Yin Ji] [巛字部] 　巤; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 324 22
[Tang Yun] Liangsheqie 【Jiyun】Strong sheerqie, sound hunting. 【Said the text】Mao Yao also. It looks like the hair is on the halogen, and the hair is in shape. [Guang Yun] This also. Also rat hair.　【Jade articles】also used as hyena.
